resources.string: There was an error splitting the document.

To split a document, select the pages you would like to extract from the PDF file. The selected pages will be highlighted.

When you are done selecting, press the split button at the bottom right to initiate the splitting process.

After the process is complete, the split view will be closed and the result is two PDF files. One with all the selected pages and another one with the unselected pages. The original PDF file remains unchanged.
This file doesn\'t have any annotations.
You can add one by long-pressing the PDF document at the location where you want to add the annotation.
Are you done editing and want to keep your changes?
